name: Be Trapped
description:
DO YOU LOVE KOREAN AND K-POP?

 "Be Trapped" is inspired by a horror movie called Gonjiam. Our game offers a skill tree of lessons that drill you on new hangul vocabulary. 

Remember to "Think beyond the box" to escape from this school 🫣
